labels.analysis: The MCP Server specializes in extracting and summarizing content from YouTube videos, providing tools to fetch metadata (titles, descriptions, captions) and enabling natural language queries for comprehensive summaries. Its primary function aligns with processing video content for research or quick understanding. The integration with Claude Desktop suggests an emphasis on enhancing human understanding of multimedia content.
labels.reasoning: The **Web Search & Research** label is chosen because the server's core function is to extract and summarize information from YouTube videos, which is a common research task. **Content Creation** is a secondary label as it assists in processing and reformatting existing video content for easier consumption or repurposing. **AI/ML Tools** could be considered secondary due to the natural language query capabilities.

tools.name: get-video-info-for-summary-from-url
tools.description: Get title, description, duration, and captions of a YouTube video from a URL

videoUrl.description: The URL or ID of the YouTube video

languageCode.description: The language code of the video

server_info_crawled.name: YouTube Video Summarizer
server_info_crawled.author: @nabid-pf/youtube-video-summarizer-mcp
server_info_crawled.overview: Summarize YouTube videos by extracting titles, descriptions, and transcripts to provide comprehensive video summaries. Enable natural language queries to get key points and detailed summaries from any YouTube video URL. Integrate seamlessly with Claude Desktop for enhanced video content understanding.

tools.name: get-video-info-for-summary-from-url
tools.description: Get title, description, duration, and captions of a YouTube video from a URL

videoUrl.description: The URL or ID of the YouTube video

languageCode.description: The language code of the video

server_info_crawled.python_sdk:
import mcp
from mcp.client.streamable_http import streamablehttp_client
import json
import base64

smithery_api_key = ""
url = f"https://server.smithery.ai/@nabid-pf/youtube-video-summarizer-mcp/mcp?api_key={smithery_api_key}"

async def main():
    # Connect to the server using HTTP client
    async with streamablehttp_client(url) as (read_stream, write_stream, _):
        async with mcp.ClientSession(read_stream, write_stream) as session:
            # Initialize the connection
            await session.initialize()
            # List available tools
            tools_result = await session.list_tools()
            print(f"Available tools: {', '.join([t.name for t in tools_result.tools])}")

if __name__ == "__main__":
    import asyncio
    asyncio.run(main())
